name: Chemical Hearts
description: A teenage boy falls in love with a troubled girl who transfers to his high school.

review.author: anabiaq
review.heading: Young Love.
review.reviewBody: It jumps ahead from the typical teenager romance and explores the reality of young love and heartbreak. I could relate so much on how they portrayed the confusion about being in love and about being someone that you aren't ready to be yet. If you are someone that easily cries watching movies, you should totally bring a tissue with you. Lili Reinhart's acting is flawless and the way she embraced the role of grace town is totally out of this world.
